meanings.sent1: The seaborne cargo arrived safely at the port.
meanings.sent2: The company specializes in seaborne shipping.
meanings.sent3: The seaborne treasure hunt turned out to be a fun adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her seaborne dreams carried her to distant shores.
meanings.sent5: The seaborne breeze filled the sails with salty air.

meanings.definition: relating to or situated near the sea
meanings.sent1: The seaborne town had a picturesque view of the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The seaborne restaurant offered fresh seafood dishes.
meanings.sent3: The seaborne seagulls squawked loudly by the shore.
meanings.sent4: His seaborne memories were filled with sandy beaches.
meanings.sent5: The seaborne sunset painted the sky in shades of pink and orange.
